description: Bring back lemonade with this adults-only tipple that spikes raspberries, peach and sparkling water with white rum. Serve in highball glasses.
name: Peach Lemonade With Rum & Raspberries Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 3 yellow peaches, plus extra to serve
1 cup raspberries, plus extra to serve

recipeInstructions.text: Combine sugar and 1 cup water in a medium saucepan over medium heat. Stir for 5 minutes or until sugar dissolves and mixture comes to the boil. Add peach and raspberries and cook for a further 10 minutes or until fruit is soft. Transfer to a blender and blend until smooth. Cool. Strain mixture and discard solids. Add lemon juice and rum to purée.
Add ice to glasses or a large jug. Add 1/4 cup purée to each glass and top with mineral water. Garnish with skewered extra fruit and serve.
